name: Greninja BREAK
author: 5ban Graphics

abilities.name: Giant Water Shuriken
abilities.effect: Once during your turn (before your attack), if this Pokémon is your Active Pokémon, you may discard a {W} Energy card from your hand. If you do, put 6 damage counters on 1 of your opponent’s Pokémon.

rule_box: Greninja BREAK retains the attacks, Abilities, Weakness, Resistance, and Retreat Cost of its previous Evolution.
